title: Does Urbanization Affect Power Outages?
description: An analytical project for DSC 80 at UCSD analyzing major power outages in the U.S. from January 2000 to July 2016. Uses data from Purdue University's infrastructure lab.

title: Interactive General Knowledge Quiz
description: A project using a double linked list to store and traverse quiz questions, options, and answers. Demonstrates expertise in data structures and interactive applications.

title: League of Legends Win Rate Analysis
description: Analyzes win rates by region using data from Oracle’s Elixir. Uses statistical analysis and hypothesis testing to evaluate competitive balance.

title: Financial Planning Model
description: A long-term financial planning model incorporating 401K investment strategies, bonds, and savings to optimize financial growth.

title: Sign Language LLM for Accessibility
description: A machine learning model aimed at converting sign language into text and speech, enabling better accessibility for the deaf community.

title: Food Critic Website for UCSD Dining Halls
description: An interactive food review website allowing students to rate and review meals at different dining halls on campus.

title: Music Analysis: Comparative Study
description: A comparative analysis of musical compositions using theoretical and historical perspectives.

title: GitHub API Data Fetching
description: Uses GitHub’s public API to dynamically fetch and display profile statistics such as repositories, followers, and contributions.

title: Chinook Database SQL Analysis
description: An SQL project analyzing the Chinook database to retrieve insights on sales, artists, and music trends.

title: Machine Learning for Predicting League of Legends Match Outcomes
description: Implements machine learning techniques to predict match outcomes based on champion picks, player stats, and in-game objectives.

title: Historical Data Visualization for Power Outages
description: An interactive visualization tool mapping major power outages across the U.S. over time.

title: Web Conference Sign Language Translator
description: A web conferencing tool integrating sign language translation into real-time virtual meetings to improve accessibility.
